BarcodeType.description: The type of the barcode e.g  UPC, EAB, QRCode, Code39, Code128, DataMatrix, PDF417, ITF14, Codabar, MaxiCode

BarcodeSource.description: The source of the barcode instance

Lineage.description: The event lineage (e.g eventId, asOf) that lead to the observed/derived state of this object/data part
